author: Fiona Denton
description:
I know that for some of us, epic fantasy has never left, but The Last Vigilant by Mark A. Latham might suggest that, for traditional publishing, epic fantasy is back. I’ve shoved the cover of this under lots of people’s noses, and everyone has oohed and aahed. It reminds me of the fantasy covers of […]

The post REVIEW: The Last Vigilant by Mark A. Latham appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Last Vigilant by Mark A. Latham
